column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////In for brunch as recommended by Culture Map. Not my first time to a DJ'ed brunch but perhaps I'm now too old
column2: or the music was too loud
column3: or some combination of the two. At any rate
column4: I found it difficult to speak to the person next to me. That said
column5: the music was good--nice mix. The restaurant was drafty on a cold day
column6: and the service was a bit slow. The rest is good--very cool interior design
column7: lots of TVs in view from most every table
column9: terrific menu (hard to pick just one). They also have a tremendous libation game.
